name: Tupi
description:
Who will Conquer this chaotic land?

Fight against enemy tribes over the control of Brazil before the arrival of the europeans.

Inspired by "Mount and Blade: Warband" and "Right Click to Necromance Controls:

Side note: There's a tutorial ingame but I thought that would be nice to have here too

Mouse Left Click: Move.

Space: Recruit nearby warriors(They must have a white shield)

Tab: Hide/Unhide small tutorial

A and D : alternate between troop types:

1 - 5:Give Orders

1 - Charge

2 - Hold

3 - Follow

4 - Retreat

5 - Regroup

To finish the game you have to conquer ALL the 10 villages

If you collect all the Milks across the map, you'll get a fighting bonus,

Last note:

There are a lot of bugs that I couldn't fix in time for the Jam (This game was made in less than a week). Sorry for that.

My main goal was to create a game like Mount and blade but without the map. At least I tried.
